required_header.download_date: ClinicalTrials.gov processed this data on May 29, 2018
required_header.link_text: Link to the current ClinicalTrials.gov record.

clinical_study.official_title: Circulating Silicone After Cosmetic Silicone Injection in Transgender Patients

brief_summary.textblock:
This cross-sectional monocentric study will describe transgender men transitioning into women and who had cosmetic silicone injection.
The principal objective is to estimate the prevalence of Transgender with circulating monocytes containing silicone vacuoles in blood smears among Male to Female Transgender population with a history of cosmetic silicon injections.
The secondary objectives are to describe the transgender population, to describe the quantity of silicone in vacuoles of circulating monocytes, and the association between dermatological complications (inflammatory and not inflammatory) and several clinical and biological characteristics (HIV status, level of immunosuppression, inflammatory syndrome, quantity of silicone which was injected , silicone quantity in blood smears).

detailed_description.textblock:
Injectable liquid silicone is a permanent filling product which is no more used in France because of a high risk of complications. Cosmetic silicone injection is a common feminization approach for transgender populations.
This cross-sectional monocentric study will describe transgender men transitioning into women and who had cosmetic silicone injection.
The principal objective is to estimate the prevalence of Transgender with circulating monocytes containing silicone vacuoles in blood smears among Male to Female Transgender population with a history of cosmetic silicon injections.
The secondary objectives are to describe the transgender population, to describe the quantity of silicone in vacuoles of circulating monocytes, and the association between dermatological complications (inflammatory and not inflammatory) and several clinical and biological characteristics (HIV status, level of immunosuppression, inflammatory syndrome, quantity of silicone which was injected , silicone quantity in blood smears).

primary_outcome.measure: The prevalence of Transgender with circulating monocytes containing silicone vacuoles in blood smear among Male to Female Transgender population, the day of their consultation.
primary_outcome.description: The prevalence of Transgender with circulating monocytes containing silicone vacuoles will be calculated as the number of subjects with monocytes containing silicone vacuoles in blood smears on the number of subjects with a history of silicone cosmetic injection

secondary_outcome.measure: Number of monocytes with vacuoles of silicone in a standardized area of 25 monocytes per blood smear slide
Size of silicone vacuoles in monocytes
Inflammatory and not inflammatory dermatological complications
secondary_outcome.description: assessment of dermatological complications during the clinical examination

secondary_outcome.measure: Number of patients with a positive HIV status
secondary_outcome.description: Number of patients with a positive HIV status

secondary_outcome.measure: Level of immunosuppression estimated with viral charge
secondary_outcome.description: HIV viral load, the day of the admission or the last value known in the 6 month prior to the consultation

secondary_outcome.measure: Level of immunosuppression estimated with cluster of differentiation 4 cell (CD4) rate
secondary_outcome.description: CD4 cell count the day of the consultation or the last value known in the 6 month prior to the consultation. CD4 cell stands for Cluster of differentiation antigen 4 cell.

secondary_outcome.measure: Inflammatory syndrome estimated with C-reactive protein (CRP)
Amount of injected silicone, in liters
Time since the first silicone injection for cosmetic purposes, in years
Comorbidities: Number of patients with history of Tuberculosis
secondary_outcome.description: Number of patients with history of Tuberculosis

secondary_outcome.measure: Comorbidities: Number of patients with history of Hepatitis B
secondary_outcome.description: Number of patients with history of Hepatitis B

secondary_outcome.measure: Comorbidities: Number of patients with history of Hepatitis C
secondary_outcome.description: Number of patients with history of Hepatitis C

secondary_outcome.measure: Comorbidities: Number of patients with history of Syphilis
secondary_outcome.description: Number of patients with history of Syphilis

arm_group.description: People responding to inclusion criteria with a history of cosmetic silicone injection

study_pop.textblock: Every transgender men transitioning into women patients with cosmetic silicone injection and consulting in Bichat hospital.

criteria.textblock:
Inclusion Criteria:
- Adults
- Not in opposition to data collection
- Transgender men transitioning into women patients with cosmetic silicone injection
- Consultation in Bichat hospital
Exclusion Criteria:
- Unable to communicate
- Guardianship, curatorship
